name: Healthcare Services
description: Lyon-Martin primary care team will work with you to identify health and wellness goals and create a care plan. Your primary care team consists of a Primary Care Provider (PCP), a Nurse (RN), a Medical Assistant (MA), and a Care Coordinator (CC)Your Care Coordinator assists with navigating referrals, doing paperwork, enrolling you in support services, and changing identity documents. We also have Therapists, Psychiatrists, Case Managers, Physical Therapists, Acupuncturists, a Speech Therapist, a

howToGetIt: Call us at (415) 565-7667 to schedule a new patient appointment.
cost: All services are provided regardless of ability to pay. No one will be sent to collections for not paying bills
